titleStmt.title: The speech of Francis Lovelace Esquire recorder of Canterbury. To the Kings most Excellent Majestie at his coming to Canterbury the 27 day of October 1660.
titleStmt.author: Lovelace, Francis, 1594-1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by S. Griffin, for Matthew Walbancke, at Grays-Inne Gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
